title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town encounter strange phenomena

episodes.title: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.description: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab.

episodes.title: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.description: As the town searches for a missing boy, a group of friends discovers a girl with telekinetic powers.

episodes.title: Holly, Jolly
episodes.description: A mother's search for her missing son leads to a series of mysteries and supernatural occurrences in the town.

episodes.title: The Body
episodes.description: The friends uncover a shocking truth about the missing boy as they confront a terrifying creature from another dimension.

episodes.title: The Flea and the Acrobat
episodes.description: A girl with telekinetic abilities joins the group as they face new challenges and a dangerous government conspiracy.

episodes.title: The Monster
episodes.description: The group battles a monstrous creature, and secrets about the government lab and the missing boy are revealed.

episodes.title: The Bathtub
episodes.description: The friends embark on a mission to rescue their friend from the parallel dimension, encountering new dangers and allies.

episodes.title: The Upside Down
episodes.description: The group faces a final showdown with the otherworldly threat as they try to save their friend and unravel the mysteries.

episodes.title: MADMAX
episodes.description: The town is shaken by the arrival of a new girl with a troubled past as the group faces a new threat.

episodes.title: Trick or Treat, Freak
episodes.description: On Halloween night, the group faces a series of challenges and encounters a mysterious figure from Eleven's past.

episodes.title: The Pollywog
episodes.description: A strange creature appears, leading the group on a mission to protect their town and uncover a dark secret.

episodes.title: Will the Wise
episodes.description: Will experiences strange visions, and the group uncovers a connection between the new threat and the parallel dimension.

episodes.title: Dig Dug
episodes.description: The group goes on a perilous journey to rescue their friend and confront the mysteries of the underground tunnels.

episodes.title: The Spy
episodes.description: As tensions rise, secrets are revealed, and the group faces betrayals that threaten to tear them apart.

episodes.title: The Lost Sister
episodes.description: Eleven goes on a personal journey, encountering a gang of misfits with supernatural abilities.

episodes.title: The Mind Flayer
episodes.description: The group confronts a powerful enemy as the supernatural threat intensifies, putting the town in grave danger.

episodes.title: The Gate
episodes.description: In a final battle, the group faces the source of the supernatural threat and fights to save their town.

episodes.title: Suzie, Do You Copy?
episodes.description: As the town celebrates the Fourth of July, a new threat emerges, and the group faces challenges on multiple fronts.

episodes.title: The Mall Rats
episodes.description: The group investigates strange occurrences at the new mall, uncovering a conspiracy that goes beyond their imagination.

episodes.title: The Case of the Missing Lifeguard
episodes.description: The search for a missing lifeguard leads the group to a sinister plot involving mind control and secret experiments.

episodes.title: The Sauna Test
episodes.description: As tensions rise, the group faces a deadly challenge, and the true nature of the supernatural threat is revealed.

episodes.title: The Flayed
episodes.description: The group discovers a disturbing connection between the supernatural threat and the townspeople, leading to a race against time.

episodes.title: E Pluribus Unum
episodes.description: As the supernatural threat escalates, the group confronts a mind-bending reality and fights for the survival of their town.

episodes.title: The Bite
episodes.description: The group faces personal and collective challenges as the supernatural threat reaches a critical point, and sacrifices are made.

episodes.title: The Battle of Starcourt
episodes.description: In a climactic battle, the group confronts the supernatural threat, and the fate of the town hangs in the balance.

episodes.title: The Hellfire Club
episodes.description: A new mystery unfolds as the group encounters a secret society and delves into the dark history of their town.

episodes.title: Tick Tok Mr. Clock
episodes.description: Time is of the essence as the group races against a ticking clock to unravel a conspiracy and save their town.

episodes.title: You Snooze You Lose
episodes.description: The group faces unexpected challenges and must navigate a dangerous game that puts their lives on the line.

episodes.title: The Body Snatchers
episodes.description: A chilling discovery leads the group to confront a threat that takes on a horrifying new form.

episodes.title: The Great Escape
episodes.description: As the group plans a daring escape, they uncover shocking truths and face betrayals that test their loyalty.

episodes.title: The Dive
episodes.description: The group dives into the unknown, facing perilous challenges and discovering secrets that change everything.

episodes.title: The Lost Sister
episodes.description: Old and new allies emerge as the group faces a formidable foe, and the past comes back to haunt them.

episodes.title: The Mind Flayer
episodes.description: The supernatural threat reaches its peak, and the group must confront the true nature of the enemy to save their town.

episodes.title: The Gate
episodes.description: In a final showdown, the group battles the supernatural forces to close the gate and secure the safety of their town.

title: La Casa de Papel
description: A group of criminals plans and executes the perfect heist on the Royal Mint of Spain.

episodes.title: Do as Planned
episodes.description: The Professor recruits eight criminals to carry out the plan to rob the Royal Mint.

episodes.title: Lethal Negligence
episodes.description: The heist is underway, but mistakes and unforeseen events put the plan at risk.

episodes.title: Mistakes
episodes.description: Tensions rise as the criminals face unexpected challenges during the heist.

episodes.title: Trojan Horse
episodes.description: The Professor's intricate plan faces new threats as the heist progresses.

episodes.title: Groundhog Day
episodes.description: Repeating challenges test the robbers' resolve as they try to maintain control.

episodes.title: Warm Cold War
episodes.description: Internal conflicts and external pressures complicate the already complex situation.

episodes.title: Cool Instability
episodes.description: The heist faces a critical turning point with unexpected consequences.

episodes.title: You're Insane
episodes.description: The situation becomes increasingly dire as the Professor's plan is pushed to the limit.

episodes.title: A New Reality
episodes.description: The aftermath of the first heist forces the Professor and his team to adapt to a changed reality.

episodes.title: The Head of the Plan
episodes.description: New challenges and unexpected alliances emerge as the Professor faces formidable adversaries.

episodes.title: Rats
episodes.description: Internal and external threats escalate, putting the heist and the Professor's plan at risk.

episodes.title: Boom, Boom, Ciao
episodes.description: The heist reaches a critical moment as the Professor and his team confront their toughest challenges.

episodes.title: Red Boxes
episodes.description: The Professor's strategies are put to the test, leading to unexpected twists and turns.

episodes.title: Everything Seemed Insignificant
episodes.description: As the heist intensifies, personal relationships and loyalties are strained to the breaking point.

episodes.title: Subdued Astronomy
episodes.description: The Professor and his team face internal and external pressures as they navigate a complex web of challenges.

episodes.title: The Drift
episodes.description: The heist reaches its climax, with the Professor and his team facing the consequences of their actions.

episodes.title: We're Back
episodes.description: The Professor reunites the team for a new heist, but old and new enemies complicate the plan.

episodes.title: Aikido
episodes.description: The heist faces unexpected challenges, testing the team's unity and resolve.

episodes.title: 48 Meters Underground
episodes.description: As the heist progresses, the Professor and his team confront unforeseen obstacles and betrayals.

episodes.title: The Perfect Crime
episodes.description: Tensions rise as the Professor's plan encounters unexpected complications and personal conflicts.

episodes.title: Berlin's Wedding
episodes.description: Flashbacks reveal key events as the Professor and his team grapple with emotional and strategic challenges.

episodes.title: Everything Seemed Insignificant
episodes.description: The heist reaches a critical juncture with new alliances, betrayals, and high-stakes decisions.

episodes.title: Little Vacations
episodes.description: The Professor and his team face escalating threats and internal conflicts as the heist unfolds.

episodes.title: The Fly
episodes.description: As the heist nears its climax, the Professor and his team confront the consequences of their actions.

episodes.title: Game Over
episodes.description: The Professor and his team face their toughest challenge yet as old and new enemies close in.

episodes.title: Tokyo's Wedding
episodes.description: Flashbacks and present-day events reveal key moments in the characters' lives as the heist reaches a climax.

episodes.title: Anatomy Lesson
episodes.description: The Professor and his team confront personal and strategic challenges with the heist on the line.

episodes.title: Spain's Breath
episodes.description: The heist faces unexpected twists and betrayals, pushing the Professor and his team to their limits.

episodes.title: 5 Minutes Earlier
episodes.description: As the heist approaches its conclusion, the Professor and his team confront the fallout of their choices.

episodes.title: TKO
episodes.description: The Professor and his team face their final challenges as the heist reaches its epic conclusion.

episodes.title: Strike the Tent
episodes.description: The aftermath of the heist reveals the fates of the characters as they come to terms with the consequences.

episodes.title: Paris Plan
episodes.description: Flashbacks and present-day events intertwine as the Professor and his team navigate the aftermath of the heist.
